1.content: Now is the time to choose a girl... there is course the classic Carmelita, but there are other girls to choose from.
1.title: Introduction

11.content:
Always gotta go with the classics.

Now, how and why would Carmelita gain weight/expand? You have 4 scenarios to choose from

Scenario 1: Self explanatory Feeder/Feedee dynamic with Carmelita being the fat one.

Scenario 2: Carmelita is fired from her job after failing to catch Sly too many times, and the results are predictable

Scenario 3: Carmelita is manages to reacquire an artifact that Sly Cooper had stolen... however the artifact puts a certain kind of curse on her... need I say more?

Scenario 4: Carmelita is being held hostage by someone other than Sly, Naturally, being as combative as she is... her captors have to find some way to both pin her down, and make it difficult for somebody to rescue her.
11.title: Carmelita Fox

14.content:
That Cajun Gator woman is already fat by default, but that shouldn't stop us from making her grow even bigger!

The only question is how?

Scenario 1: After discovering a way to boost her magical prowess, that makes her grow Mizz Ruby uses her voodoo magic to reanimate an army of skeletons to feed her.

Scenario 2: Mizz Ruby Finds love, and this guy wants more gator.

Scenario 3: An experiment with her voodoo magic goes horribly wrong for Mizz Ruby leading to... predictable results for this kind of story.
14.title: Mizz Ruby

info.brief_description: The women of the sly cooper video game series gain loads of weight.
info.description:
The Women of the Sly Cooper series get greedy and gluttonous. So they start gaining weight for any reason you can think up.

There are no weight limits, but there are only two restrictions: 1: slob isn't allowed, as the focus is the fat bodies of the girls, not what's on their fat bodies. And 2: Only females from the series can gain weight, having the males like Sly get fat as well would defeat the name/purpose of this story.

Alternative expansion methods like blueberry inflation, regular air/water inflation, vore, and pregnancy, can be used to spice the story up if you wish, but the primary emphasis must always be on expanding the girl's bellies.

Enjoy
